Barry Thomas=
 <warlord@...> wrote:
Rod - I used to once own a pair of Phoenix m=
enuki.  As Clive said, the H=F4=F4 bird
is indeed found in Japanese sword f=
ittings, but it is far from commonly
encountered.  Perhaps we could take th=
is offline??  What books have you
searched??

Regards,

Barry Thomas.
